body.p:
Elizabeth Town Ky
February 3d/65
To His Excellency Govnr Bramblet
Govenor

I See your letter of Jan 31stto Major Wm Alen and as I am A Vetren Soldier and cannot Stay at Home in peace I desier to recruit A Company of vetran Soldiers to be mustered in to the State Cirvace for the period of Twelve months to be paid armed and mted by the State and to be Stationed at Elizabethtown if possible or at least have my Head Qrs to at that place please write me at once

I am Yours
Very Respcty
Your obdt Servant
John F Lay

Elizabethtown Ky
Feby 3d 1865
Lay John F.
To The Gov --
Desires authority to raise a Co. of veterans for 12 months state service -- The Co. to be stationed at Elizabethtown --

J. M
Recd A. G. O. Ky 6 Feby 1865
